item.title: London Travel Advice
item.description: London Travel Advice British Museum, the National Gallery, the Natural History Museum, the Tate, and the Victoria & Albert Museum TimeOut Magazine for Food [[Guide to Living in London]] Packing List Clothes Raincoat (water resistant) Warm coat Long sleeve shirts (3-4) Short sleeve shirts (2-3) Lighter sweaters/jackets (2-3, easy for layering) Warmer sweaters (1-2) Jeans/Leggings/Other pants (3-4) At least one outfit for formal occasions A set of workout clothes Pyjamas Swimsuit –in case you travel somewhere warm Underwear and socks (at least two weeks’ worth, and maybe 1-2 pairs of woollysocks) Accessories (scarves, jewelleryetc.
